description: The output strings on nova-volume-usage-audit don't go through translation. As those are use visible messages, it should be fixed.
title: nova-volume-usage-audit has un i18ned output strings

comments.content: The output strings on nova-volume-usage-audit don't go through translation. As those are use visible messages, it should be fixed.

comments.content: bin/nova-volume-usage-audit probably needs it's output strings to go through gettext
